snp5.2:3.1: The same verse was asked of Mahāvīra at Isibhāsiyāiṁ 29.1. The answers are quite different, however, as the Buddha directly addresses the question whereas Mahāvīra’s response is more oblique.
snp5.2:7.1: “Appraised” is saṅkhāta, literally “calculated, enumerated”. | Dhammāse is an archaic masculine nominative plural found only in poetry (eg. sāvakāse at DN 21:1.12.11, gatāse at SN 1.37:9.1).
